description: This unit examines selected areas of torts law from a comparative perspective. It analyses current issues and emerging trends across common law and civil law jurisdictions.The topics covered include the following:   Aims and methods of comparative legal studies;   Development of tort law in common law and civil jurisdictions;   Europeanisation of tort law;   Liability for pure economic loss;   Liability for psychological harm;   Liability for 'wrongful life' and 'wrongful birth';   Proof of causation;   Protection of privacy.
